release.action: Fixed java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/bea/xml/XmlException by adding WebLogic necessary artifacts.
Added -noexit parameter so that all goals do not terminate after execution.
Added expression to WebLogic parameters for easy configuration using profiles.
Changed WebLogic artifacts version to [9.0,) to allow easier WebLogic version compatibility.
Fixed WeblogicMojoUtilities.getDependencies() to get path separator from system property.
Fixed getInputArtifactPath() so that if directory is supported for artifactPath.
